Class ExPANdS.Solution

java.lang.Object
  ExPANdS.Solution
Enclosing class:
ExPANdS
public final class ExPANdS.Solution
extends java.lang.Object

Stores alternative solutions (PM_B, PM, f)=(B-allele ploidy, total ploidy, cellular frequency) computed for the NGS derived measures: AF - B-allele frequency, CN - copy number and PN_B - ploidy of the B-allele in normal cells, that are associated with a mutated locus.

Author:
Noemi

Field Summary
private  double AF
          B-allele frequency among all cells (input)
private  double CN
          Average copy number among all cells (input)
private  double dev
          Error term assessing how well outputs can explain inputs
private  double f
          Cellular frequency (output)
private  int PM
          Total B-allele ploidy in mutated cells (output)
private  int PM_B
          B-allele ploidy in mutated cells (output)
private  int PN
          Total B-allele ploidy in normal cells (input, should equal 2)
private  int PN_B
          B-allele ploidy in normal cells (input)
